instruction.en:
Tap the pinhole reset button using the pinhole tool included (or a paperclip) and press and hold the 1 key for three seconds to enter inclusion mode.

Make sure you have the Device Specific Key (DSK) at hand, the device will reset itself when not entered within 1 minute.
Unplug the power and tap the pinhole reset button using the pinhole tool included (or a paperclip).
